author: Special Correspondent
text:
Power supply will be disrupted on Friday at the following places

Between 9.30 a.m. and 2.30 p.m.: ECR between Marappalam junction and Rajiv Gandhi statue and adjoining areas, Ellaipillaichavady, Maraimalai Nagar, Mariamman Nagar, Jhonsy Nagar, Natesan Nagar, Anna Nagar, TV Salai, Saram, Kosapalayam, Kamaraj Salai and Nelithope Market.

Between 10 a.m. and 3.30 p.m.: Muthialpet, MG Road, Vaithikuppam, Kurusukuppam, TV Nagar, Ezhil Nagar, Samipillaithottam, Deivangampillai Thottam.

Between 2 p.m. and 5.30 p.m.: Botanical Garden, Subbiah Salai, Old Bus Stand area, Daveethupet, Govinda Salai, Badhar Sahib Street, Petit Canal Street, St. Theresa Street, Louis Pragasam Street, VOC Street, Mission Street, Ambour Salai, Thambu Naikar Street, Bussy Street, Raja Singh Street, Mulla Street, Ramraja Street, Sheji Street, JN Street, Nallpillai Santhu, Canteen Street, Rangapillai Street, Needarajapaiyar Street and Thiyagu Mudaliar Street.
title: Power shutdown
